lead_paragraph: SESSIONS--L. William (Bill), died peacefully on May 13 at age 96 with his family gathered at home in New Canaan, CT. He lived a vibrant life with love for his family, friends and community. He is survived by his wife of 72 years Nancy, sons Stuart (Elizabeth Morrison) of Chevy Chase, MD and David (Kathleen Donohoe) of Ypsilanti, MI, daughters Andy (Martin Zenni) of Andersonville, TN and Brooke (Hank Berkowitz) of Rowayton, CT and nine grandchildren: Tina (Spencer Pahlke), Carrie, Sarah, Steve, Rob, Billy, Jake, Colton and Mike. A memorial service will be held May 28 at 11am at St. Mark's Episcopal Church, 111 Oenoke Ridge Road, New Canaan, CT, with a reception to follow nearby. 1/3
